title: I CAN'T LOAD INTO THE PBE SIGNUP SITE

embed.description: The Public Beta Environment (PBE) is a limited-access public League of Legends realm where players help us test "declassified" features, content and experiments that aren't yet (and may never be) ready for prime time.

body: Every time I try to access this site to try to apply, I always get a blitzcrank with the error "500". Does this have something to do with my computer or is it at your end Riot?

replies.body:
This typically happens if there's an issue between your PC and that webpage. This can usually be bypassed by utilizing a Virtual Private Network (VPN) such as [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/). 

Let me know if this helped. ^.^
